ProjectTitle: Dissecting the genetic interactions controlling α-Synuclein accumulation in Parkinson’s Disease
InitialFeedbackHistory:
03/07/2024
You are using human bodily material, which is personal data, so indicate that you use personal data for question "Will you process personal data?"

Please include the EC ethical approval number for your research (S number).

You indicate that you will use parental Ctl65 iPSC and derived lines. Are these existing data? If yes, then include those as existing data in the data summary table. 

Other then that, your responses are largely the standard VIB responses that we frequently see. Make sure they are fit for purpose for your research.

05/06/2023
FWO this year uses the Standard Flemish DMP template. Your DMP is still in a very old version. So please convert and resubmit. See guidance and template here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp

Also, you need to include a detailed list of datasets your research will generate. That is missing at the moment. Your DMP contains largely very generic text, without going into detail on the data you will use / generate in your research.

It may be helpful to contact the RDM helpdesk and request an in-person meeting to discuss how to write a DMP that suits your research.
label: not good
